item.title: Bills Keeping Foreign Money Out Of Ballot Measure Campaigns Pick Up Steam In Republican States
item.description: Republican lawmakers in several states are making a concerted effort to keep foreign money out of ballot initiative campaigns.

item.title: DOGE’s Work Is Meaningless Unless Republicans Get Serious About Cutting Spending
item.description: DOGE's work in uncovering abuse of taxpayer dollars will be meaningless unless Republicans get serious about D.C.'s spending problem.

item.title: Making America Healthy Again Starts With Addressing The Root Causes Of Infertility
item.description: Making America Healthy Again starts with stopping Big Pharma’s reach. That includes its integral role in in vitro fertilization.

item.title: NYT Blasts Dr. Oz’s Financial Disclosure, While Jennifer Granholm’s Near-Identical One Escaped Scrutiny
item.description: Dr. Mehmet Oz's financial disclosure is nearly identical to the document filed by former Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm.

item.title: Chat Logs Show Queer NSA Employees Discussing Perverted Acts At Work
item.description: The NSA said it will take action against employees who abused government systems to talk about their fetishes and mutilation surgeries.
